inlineContent.text: Be the hero to change that by watching the video and providing notes! It‚Äôs super easy:

abstract.text: Discover how you can use WebKit to effortlessly integrate web content into your SwiftUI apps. Learn how to load and display web content, communicate with webpages, and more.

Learn what‚Äôs new in SwiftUI to build great apps for any Apple platform. We‚Äôll explore how to give your app a brand new look and feel with Liquid Glass. Discover how to boost performance with framework enhancements and new instruments, and integrate advanced capabilities like web content and rich text editing. We‚Äôll also show you how SwiftUI is expanding to more places, including laying out views in three dimensions.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: What‚Äôs new for the spatial web

abstract.text: Discover the latest spatial features for the web on visionOS 26. We‚Äôll cover how to display inline 3D models with the brand new HTML model element. And we‚Äôll share powerful features, including model lighting, interactions, and animations. Learn how to embed newly supported immersive media on your web site, such as 360-degree video and Apple Immersive Video. And get a sneak peek at adding a custom environment to your web pages.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: What‚Äôs new in Safari and WebKit

abstract.text: Learn how the latest web technologies in Safari and WebKit can help you create incredible experiences. We‚Äôll highlight different CSS features and how they work, including scroll driven animation, cross document view transitions, and anchor positioning. We‚Äôll also explore new media support across audio, video, images, and icons.

Learn how the WebGPU API provides safe access to GPU devices for graphics and general-purpose computation. We‚Äôll also explore the WGSL shading language to write GPU programs. And we‚Äôll dive into best practices to achieve optimal performance while using minimal power across desktop and mobile devices.

Join us for an update on Swift. We‚Äôll talk about workflow improvements that make you more productive, and new and modernized library APIs for fundamental programming tasks. We‚Äôll show examples of Swift adoption throughout more layers of the software stack. Finally, we‚Äôll explore new language features for both improving approachability of concurrency, and achieving peak performance when you need it.
